verbs.description: House Republicans [V: are] preparing to endorse President Donald Trump ’s plan for a military parade in the nation ’s capital .
[ARG0: House Republicans] are [V: preparing] [ARG2: to endorse President Donald Trump ’s plan for a military parade in the nation ’s capital] .
[ARG0: House Republicans] are preparing to [V: endorse] [ARG1: President Donald Trump ’s plan for a military parade in the nation ’s capital] .
